metadata.title: CVE-2023-34436 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the LXT2num_time_table_entries functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A speciallycrafted .lxt2 file can lead to arbitrary code execution. A victim wouldneed to open a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
